metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6638 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Imagination Technologies driver in Android 5.x before 5.1.1 LMY49F and 6.0 before 2016-01-01 allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug 24673908.

notes.Note: jdstrand> as of 2016/01/28, there is no information on this issue ignoring releases where android is not supported

criterions.comment: linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
